column1: Kata Robata////Very stingy with their sushi. We ordered california
column5: and houston rolls. All had meager amounts of fish. The houston roll is 70% rice with tiny pieces of fish. If their prices are cheap
column6: one would understand the need to have low quality rolls
column7: but their prices are not cheap. In fact
column8: their prices are way out of proportion of the quality you get. Go elsewhere...so many better choices in town.
